I don't get why disc 2 isn't working.  I didn't have any issues putting the French or German versions through ABGX, so the fact it's DLC shouldn't be causing issues.  I really hope they get this fixed.  Usually I'd just download through Usenet, but for some reason it's gone to torrents first, and I haven't seen it on abgx.net, so maybe it'll be up on Usenet tomorrow sometime and working.

Either way, it's incredibly frustrating that 3 days after being released, there hasn't been a working copy of the 2nd disc yet.
Guys, just extract the 2nd discs content to an USB stick, it's DRM free.

It's not the uploader's fault, the group released a bad file.  It's odd how such a well known and respected group like STRANGE can screw up so bad.  I just downloaded a Usenet release and it's no different from Sifmeister's file.  I hope they or someone else releases a fix or a working 2nd disc at some point.

I wonder if they even realize they screwed up.

FIX FOR SECOND DISC:

Download this:

Place the 3 files in same folder as second disc and run s-skyrd2_patch.bat and wait a bit for it to get done.
